text:
Vogue reportedly has exclusive rights to photos from the Serena Williams-Alexis Ohanian wedding in New Orleans on Thursday (Nov. 16) at the Contemporary Arts Center, so it's no surprise they have a story Friday on what guest Kim Kardashian West wore to the nuptials.

"For the occasion, Kardashian West wore a simple, black dress, a recent find on the app she's invested in, ScreenShop,'' Vogue posted Friday. "Kardashian West said of the piece, 'I'm really into effortless, clean lines,' when she spoke to Vogue earlier this month."

Read the full Vogue report here and see a larger photo.

Kim Kardashian attended Serena Williams's wedding in true minimalist fashion. https://t.co/DlaSyNVB7v -- Vogue Runway (@VogueRunway) November 17, 2017

People magazine posted a few photos from celebrity wedding guests, too, including Vogue editor Anna Wintour, actress Eva Longoria and LaLa Anthony. Read that full report here.

Kim Kardashian, Beyonce and Eva Longoria attend star-studded wedding of Serena Williams https://t.co/CBuJ0WEp8P -- ES Magazine (@ESMagOfficial) November 17, 2017

Beyonce, Jay Z, Kim Kardashian and more arrive at Serena Williams' wedding (photos) https://t.co/mGhITDk4pr pic.twitter.com/uDbaSNL8VP -- Lade's Signatory (@Ladesignatory) November 17, 2017

NOLA.com/Times-Picayune photographer Michael DeMocker was at the wedding last night, and snapped a picture where you can see Wintour's face, toward the right of one photograph:
title: Here's what Kim Kardashian West wore to Serena Williams' wedding: Vogue
